#summary This page describes how to build OpenNERO from source for Mac OS X.
#sidebar TableOfContents

*Note:* As of Sep 2014, this article is outdated.  If you manage to build OpenNERO on Mac OS X, feel free to share your experience in the comments section.

= Mac OS X =

 * Download and install [http://www.cmake.org/cmake/resources/software.html cmake]
 * Install [http://developer.apple.com/tools/xcode/ Xcode] (optional install on the Mac OS X DVD)
 * Install [http://www.wxpython.org/download.php wxPython]
 * Build and install [http://www.boost.org/doc/libs/release/more/getting_started/unix-variants.html Boost Libraries]
